descriptionlist.description:
Installed to the iWidgets directory: /var/mobile/Library/iWidgets

Tweaks that you can use with:
iWidgets or XenHTML

Widget size info:

This widget comes with 3 different sizes(Widget.plist) for iP5, iP6, iP6+.

The default size of "Widget.plist" will be iP6.

Before applying the widget with iWidgets, choose your "Widget.plist" size and delete unwanted sizes if you want to.
